channel.title: CVE Feed for hinjiriyo -- Quick Featured Images
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hinjiriyo -- Quick Featured Images

item.title: CVE-2024-3664|2024-08-01T20:20:00.507Z -- hinjiriyo -- quick%20featured%20images
item.description: The Quick Featured Images plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the set_thumbnail and delete_thumbnail functions in all versions up to, and including, 13.7.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to delete thumbnails and add thumbnails to posts they did not author.

item.title: CVE-2024-3664|2024-06-04T17:32:47.180Z -- hinjiriyo -- quick%20featured%20images
item.description: The Quick Featured Images plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the set_thumbnail and delete_thumbnail functions in all versions up to, and including, 13.7.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to delete thumbnails and add thumbnails to posts they did not author.
